category.name: Product Structure.PSE.Behavior
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: BVRManagement
preference.preference_description: Determines whether the Cut/Delete/Remove commands on a BOM View Revision (BVR) should be enabled or not. For values false/False/FALSE the commands will show the default behavior of Manufacturing Process Planner (MPP) for BVR i.e. the commands will be enabled. The default value is false.
